title: Project Gatekeeper
description: Project Gatekeeper is a comprehensive SSL toolkit designed to simplify SSL certificate issuance and enhance web security. It provides a user-friendly interface and uses CNAME Records for SSL Generation, making it more accessible to both novice users and experienced administrators. By integrating essential tools and leveraging modern technologies, Project Gatekeeper ensures SSL certificates are up-to-date and properly configured, contributing to a safer online environment.
